options.name: Send Buzz Messages In Apps
options.action: Send Buzz Messages In Apps Messenger Message Message Buzz Messages
options.description: Performs in-app buzz on the specified message. API reference documentation: [Send buzz messages in apps]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/urgent_app)

options.name: Send Buzz Text Messages
options.action: Send Buzz Text Messages Messenger Message Message Buzz Messages
options.description: Performs in-app and text message buzz on the specified message. API reference documentation: [Send buzz text messages]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/urgent_sms)

options.name: Send Phone Call Buzz
options.action: Send Phone Call Buzz Messenger Message Message Buzz Messages
options.description: Perform in-app and phone call buzz on the specified message API reference documentation: [Send phone call buzz]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/urgent_phone)

options.name: Send Messages
options.action: Send Messages Messenger Message
options.description: Sends messages to a specific user or chat, with text, rich text, interactive [message cards]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uczM3QjL3MzN04yNzcDN), group cards, name cards, images, videos, audios, files, and emojis supported. API reference documentation: [Send messages]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/create)

options.name: Read Chat History
options.action: Read Chat History Messenger Message
options.description: Obtains chat history (chat records) of chats (including private chats and group chats). API reference documentation: [Read chat history]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/list)

options.name: Reply To Messages
options.action: Reply To Messages Messenger Message
options.description: Replies to a specific message, with text, rich text, cards, group cards, name cards, images, videos, audios, files, and emojis supported. API reference documentation: [Reply to messages]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/reply)

options.name: Recall Messages
options.action: Recall Messages Messenger Message
options.description: The bot recalls messages it sent or the group owner recalls messages within a group. API reference documentation: [Recall messages]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/delete)

options.name: Obtain Content Of A Specific Message
options.value: Obtain Content Of A Specific Message
options.action: Obtain Content Of A Specific Message Messenger Message
options.description: Query message content with message_id API reference documentation: [Obtain content of a specific message]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/get)

options.name: Queries The Read Status Of A Message
options.value: Queries The Read Status Of A Message
options.action: Queries The Read Status Of A Message Messenger Message
options.description: Query the read information of the message API reference documentation: [Queries the read status of a message]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/read_users)

options.name: Obtain Resource Files In Messages
options.action: Obtain Resource Files In Messages Messenger Message
options.description: Obtains resource files in messages, including audios, videos, images, and files. **Emoji resources can’t be downloaded**, and the resource files for download can’t exceed 100 MB. API reference documentation: [Obtain resource files in messages]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message-resource/get)

options.name: Update App Messages
options.action: Update App Messages Messenger Message
options.description: Updates the content of message cards sent by an app. API reference documentation: [Update app messages]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message/patch)

options.name: Recall Messages In Batches
options.action: Recall Messages In Batches Messenger Message Batch Message
options.description: Recall messages in batches API reference documentation: [Recall messages in batches]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/batch_message/delete)

options.name: Query The Number Of Users To Whom A Batch Message Is Pushed And The Number Of Users Who Have Read The Batch Message
options.value: Query The Number Of Users To Whom A Batch Message Is Pushed And The Number Of Users Who Have Read The Batch Message
options.action: Query The Number Of Users To Whom A Batch Message Is Pushed And The Number Of Users Who Have Read The Batch Message Messenger Message Batch Message
options.description: Query the number of users to whom a batch message is pushed and the number of users who have read the batch message API reference documentation: [Query the number of users to whom a batch message is pushed and the number of users who have read the batch message]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/batch_message/read_user)

options.name: Queries The Overall Progress Of A Batch Message
options.value: Queries The Overall Progress Of A Batch Message
options.action: Queries The Overall Progress Of A Batch Message Messenger Message Batch Message
options.description: Queries the overall progress of a batch message. API reference documentation: [Queries the overall progress of a batch message.]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/batch_message/get_progress)

options.name: Upload Images
options.action: Upload Images Messenger Message Images
options.description: This API can be used to upload an image. You can upload JPEG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, TIFF, BMP, and ICO images. API reference documentation: [Upload images]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/image/create)

options.name: Download Images
options.action: Download Images Messenger Message Images
options.description: Download image resources. Only images of the message type uploaded by an app itself can be downloaded. API reference documentation: [Download images]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/image/get)

options.name: Upload Files
options.action: Upload Files Messenger Message Files
options.description: Upload files, with videos, audios, and common file types supported. API reference documentation: [Upload files]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/file/create)

options.name: Download Files
options.action: Download Files Messenger Message Files
options.description: Download files. Only files uploaded by an app itself can be downloaded. API reference documentation: [Download files]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/file/get)

options.name: Add A Reaction For A Message
options.value: Add A Reaction For A Message
options.action: Add A Reaction For A Message Messenger Message Message Reaction
options.description: Adds a reaction of the specified type for a specified message. API reference documentation: [Add a reaction for a message]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message-reaction/create)

options.name: Obtain A Reaction For A Message
options.value: Obtain A Reaction For A Message
options.action: Obtain A Reaction For A Message Messenger Message Message Reaction
options.description: Obtains a list of reactions of the specified type for a specified message. API reference documentation: [Obtain a reaction for a message]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message-reaction/list)

options.name: Delete A Reaction For A Message
options.value: Delete A Reaction For A Message
options.action: Delete A Reaction For A Message Messenger Message Message Reaction
options.description: Deletes a reaction for a specified message. API reference documentation: [Delete a reaction for a message]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/message-reaction/delete)

options.name: Create A Group
options.action: Create A Group Messenger Group
options.description: Creates a group and sets the profile photo, name, and description for the group. API reference documentation: [Create a group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat/create)

options.name: Obtain The List Of Groups With The User Or Bot
options.value: Obtain The List Of Groups With The User Or Bot
options.action: Obtain The List Of Groups With The User Or Bot Messenger Group
options.description: Obtains the list of groups with the user or bot API reference documentation: [Obtain the list of groups with the user or bot]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat/list)

options.name: Obtain Group Information
options.action: Obtain Group Information Messenger Group
options.description: Obtains basic information such as group name, description, profile photo, and owner ID. API reference documentation: [Obtain group information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat/get)

options.name: Update Group Information
options.action: Update Group Information Messenger Group
options.description: Updates the group profile photo, name, description, and configuration, or assigns new group owner. API reference documentation: [Update group information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat/update)

options.name: Delete A Group
options.action: Delete A Group Messenger Group
options.description: Deletes a group. API reference documentation: [Delete a group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat/delete)

options.name: Search For Groups Visible To A User Or Bot
options.value: Search For Groups Visible To A User Or Bot
options.action: Search For Groups Visible To A User Or Bot Messenger Group
options.description: Searches for the list of groups visible to a user or bot, including the groups that the user or bot is in, and groups that are open to the user or bot. The group information that can be obtained include group ID (chat_id), group name, and group description. API reference documentation: [Search for groups visible to a user or bot]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat/search)

options.name: Obtains The Group Member Speech Scopes
options.value: Obtains The Group Member Speech Scopes
options.action: Obtains The Group Member Speech Scopes Messenger Group
options.description: Obtains the group speech mode, the list of users who can speak, and more API reference documentation: [Obtains the group member speech scopes]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-moderation/get)

options.name: Updates Group Speech Scopes
options.action: Updates Group Speech Scopes Messenger Group
options.description: Updates the settings of group speech scopes, which can be granted to all members, only admins, or only specified users. API reference documentation: [Updates group speech scopes]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-moderation/update)

options.name: Add Users Or Bots To A Group Chat
options.value: Add Users Or Bots To A Group Chat
options.action: Add Users Or Bots To A Group Chat Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: Adds users or bots into a group chat. API reference documentation: [Add users or bots to a group chat]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-members/create)

options.name: Remove Users Or Bots From A Group Chat
options.value: Remove Users Or Bots From A Group Chat
options.action: Remove Users Or Bots From A Group Chat Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: Removes users or bots from a group chat. API reference documentation: [Remove users or bots from a group chat]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-members/delete)

options.name: Obtain Group Member List
options.action: Obtain Group Member List Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: If a user is in a group, the member list of this group is returned. API reference documentation: [Obtain group member list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-members/get)

options.name: Users Or Bots Join A Group Chat Voluntarily
options.value: Users Or Bots Join A Group Chat Voluntarily
options.action: Users Or Bots Join A Group Chat Voluntarily Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: Users or bots join a group chat voluntarily. API reference documentation: [Users or bots join a group chat voluntarily.]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-members/me_join)

options.name: Determine Whether A User Or Bot Is In A Group
options.value: Determine Whether A User Or Bot Is In A Group
options.action: Determine Whether A User Or Bot Is In A Group Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: Determines whether a user or bot is in a group based on their access_token. API reference documentation: [Determine whether a user or bot is in a group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-members/is_in_chat)

options.name: Specify Group Administrators
options.action: Specify Group Administrators Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: Specifies users or bots as the group administrators. API reference documentation: [Specify group administrators]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-managers/add_managers)

options.name: Delete Group Administrators
options.action: Delete Group Administrators Messenger Group Group Member
options.description: Deletes the specified group admins (users or bots) API reference documentation: [Delete group administrators]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-managers/delete_managers)

options.name: Obtain Group Announcement Information
options.action: Obtain Group Announcement Information Messenger Group Group Announcement
options.description: Obtains the group announcement in a chat, with the same format as [Docs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uAzM5YjLwMTO24CMzkjN). API reference documentation: [Obtain group announcement information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-announcement/get)

options.name: Update Group Announcement Info
options.action: Update Group Announcement Info Messenger Group Group Announcement
options.description: Updates the group announcement information in a chat, with the same format as [Docs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uAzM5YjLwMTO24CMzkjN). API reference documentation: [Update group announcement info]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/chat-announcement/patch)
